sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Grid, Box, styled, Paper, CardMedia, useMediaQuery, useTheme,Button } from '@mui/material';
import DownloadIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Download';
import Navbar from './Navbar';
import headerjpg from '../assets/headerImage.png'
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import MailIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Mail';
import CallIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Call';
import headerResjpg from '../assets/headerImagenew.png'
import { Call } from '@mui/icons-material';

const  Header=(props)=> {
  const theme = useTheme();
  const isSxMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("xs"));
  const isSmMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("sm"));
  const isMdMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("md"));
  const isLgMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("lg"));

  let fontSize
  return (

    <React.Fragment>
      <Navbar />
      <Container maxWidth={false} disableGutters sx={{}}>

        <Box sx={{
          flexGrow: 1,
          background: 'linear-gradient( to right, #2a2a2a 0%, #2a2a2a 63%, #f5af31 50%, #f5af31 100% )',
          paddingTop:isLgMatch?"20%":'auto'
        }}>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
          <Grid container
              spacing={0}
              direction="column"
              textAlign={isLgMatch?'center':'left'}
              style={{ justifyContent:"center",padding:"2% 2%",alignContent:'center',
              placeContent: 'end',
              alignItems:isLgMatch?'center':'auto' }} item xs={6} lg={6}>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'p',color:'#c1bbbb' }}>Hello,</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: isLgMatch?'h5':'h3', color: '#f5af31' }}>I'am Arun kumar</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'h6', color: '#a8a8a8' }}>Fornt End Developer and Web Designer</Box>
              <Button sx={{
    marginTop: "4%",width: '25%',borderColor:'#ecbb63',color:'#f5af31',fontSize:12}} variant="outlined" endIcon={<DownloadIcon />}>Resume</Button>
           <Box  sx={{flexDirection:'row',paddingTop:3}}> <LinkedInIcon/><MailIcon/><CallIcon/></Box>
            </Grid>
             
            
            <Grid spacing={0}
              direction="column" item xs={6} lg={6}>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                sx={{
                  width: isLgMatch ?'100%':'auto',
                  objectFit: 'cover',
                  height: isLgMatch ? 'auto' : 600, 
                  zIndex: 1,
                  position: "relative"
                }}
                image={isLgMatch?headerjpg:headerjpg }
                alignItems='right'
                alt="Live from space album cover"
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Box>

      </Container>
      {/* <Container maxWidth={false} disableGutters sx={{backgroundColor:'#303131',marginTop:2}}>
        <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid container
              spacing={0}
              direction="column"
              alignItems="center"
              justifyContent="center"
              style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }} item xs={6} lg={6}>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'subtitle2' }}>subtitle2</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body1' }}>body1</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body2' }}>body2</Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Box>
      </Container>
      <Container>
        <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid container
              spacing={0}
              direction="column"
              alignItems="center"
              justifyContent="center"
              style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }} item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'subtitle2' }}>subtitle2</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body1' }}>body1</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body2' }}>body2</Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Box>
      </Container>
      <Container>
        <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid container
              spacing={0}
              direction="column"
              alignItems="center"
              justifyContent="center"
              style={{ minHeight: '100vh' }} item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'subtitle2' }}>subtitle2</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body1' }}>body1</Box>
              <Box sx={{ typography: 'body2' }}>body2</Box>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Box>
      </Container> */}
    </React.Fragment>
  );
}

export default Header;
